short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With Baxbox's Chrome plugin, you can get images from Baxbox Photography as your background every time you open a new window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin uses BaxBox's photography as your browsers background every time you open a new browser window. There are a wide variety of photos in Baxbox's portfolio. Nature, Architecture, Long Exposures and Abstract Light.
